meta.title: Product Features
meta.description: Studioz platform features: smart calendar, insights, service setup, payments, studio pages, availability control, and remote projects. Explanations and images for each feature.

list.title: Smart Calendar & Sync
list.description: Full sync with Google Calendar and real-time booking system. Prevent double bookings and manage your studio hours with a click. Every new booking appears in your calendar automatically.

list.title: Insights & Data
list.description: Track revenue, active hours, and growth metrics at a glance. Make data-driven decisions to increase your profitability with clear dashboards and reports.

list.title: Service Setup
list.description: Customize every detail of your recording or podcast packages. Set flexible pricing, add-ons, and booking terms easily. Define multiple services per studio.

list.title: Payments & Billing
list.description: Accept payments securely, auto-generate invoices, and manage cash flow. All in one place—deposits, final payments, and reporting by period.

list.title: Studio Pages That Convert
list.description: We don't just display your studio—we sell it. Custom pages that work perfectly in dark and light mode. Premium, ad-free experience for your clients.

list.title: Availability Control
list.description: Set advanced availability rules, buffer times, and gaps between sessions. The system ensures no double bookings and your day runs exactly as planned. Instant or manual approval.

list.title: Remote Projects
list.description: Offer mixing, mastering, and post-production to artists nationwide. Asynchronous workflow, project-based pricing, integrated chat, and secure payments. Your studio doesn't need to be open for you to earn.
